NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setMaxRequestableAmount(uint256)":{"params":{"_maxRequestableAmount":"The maximum amount of token that can be requested in proposal"}},"setMinRequestableAmount(uint256)":{"params":{"_minRequestableAmount":"The minimum amount of token that can be requested in proposal"}},"submitProposal(string,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Allows users to submit a proposal","params":{"_maximumAmount":"The maximum amount of fundingToken requested","_metadata":"The metadata of the proposal","_minimumAmount":"The minimum amount of fundingToken requested","_recipient":"The address that will receive the fundingToken if the proposal is accepted"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"voteOnProposal(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Allows users to vote on a proposal","params":{"_amount":"The amount of votingToken to vote with","_proposalId":"The id of the proposal to vote on"}}},"stateVariables":{"i_tallyDate":{"details":"The date in which the tally will be taken as seconds since unix epoch"}},"title":"FundingVault","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"distributeFunds()":{"notice":"Can only be called after the tally date has passed"},"releaseVotingTokens()":{"notice":"Can only be called after the tally date has passed"},"setMaxRequestableAmount(uint256)":{"notice":"Only the owner can call this function"},"setMinRequestableAmount(uint256)":{"notice":"Only the owner can call this function"}},"notice":"A contract that allows users to deposit funds and vote on proposals, after voting ends anyone can call distributeFunds to distribute the funds to the proposals Whether a proposal is selected for receiving funds is decided using this formula: Let: `V(p)` be the number of votingPowerTokens assigned to proposal `p` `S` be the total supply of votingPowerTokens `R` be the vault's balance of fundingTokens A proposal `p` is accepted iff `R * V(p)/S >= p.minimumAmount`. The funding to be received by an accepted proposal `p` is `min(p.maximumAmount, R * V(p)/S)`. The funding to be received by a rejected proposal `p` is ac29008850","dweb:/ipfs/QmcrhfPgVNf5mkdhQvy1pMv51TFokD3Y4Wa5WZhFqVh8UV"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf980daa263b661ab8ddee7d4fd833c7da7e7995e2c359ff1f17e67e4112f2236","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7448ab095d6940130bcf76ba47a2eab14148c83119523b93dd89f6d84edd6c02","dweb:/ipfs/QmawrZ4voKQjH3oomXT3Kuheb3Mnmo2VvVpxg8Ne5UJUrd"]},"src/FundingVault.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9a9026798811eb4f8aee1f2d612f2577c242a8dbc551f7259b467eecbb7cf8b1","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://77cdea15bec4007d7d87f678adbb4fc1bb5311bff9cae9631a8e59c780d4ef94","dweb:/ipfs/QmQkWmbSQVPKspoK79u9SmV9quddWcjFHFGZfWvP9nHLge"]},"src/VotingPowerToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x759b62ddea16c03bc667f765fe1f339c3bc01f9139c3c60d7184bc761d4794f0","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://a20ad65d7e185eeb3a1b0ff7d080e874674d828e759d3200a5aea1388364c4ec","dweb:/ipfs/QmZwoUSpR7RazimRGpGkCyPVSyWHY7nfzM7dhFon8GTzk5"]}},"version":1}

calculateFundingToBeReceived(uint256).details: Calculates the amount of fundingToken to be received by a proposal

params._proposalId: The id of the proposal to calculate the funding for

returns._0: The amount of fundingToken to be received by the proposal

params._fundingToken: The token that will be used to fund the proposals
params._maxRequestableAmount: The maximum amount of token that can be requested in proposal
params._minRequestableAmount: The minimum amount of token that can be requested in proposal
params._tallyDate: The date in which the tally will be taken as seconds since unix epoch
params._votingPowerToken: The token that will be minted when a user locks their voting tokens
params._votingToken: The token that will be locked against voting power tokens, which allows the user to vote on proposals

deposit(uint256).details: Allows users to deposit fundingToken into the vault

params._amount: The amount of fundingToken to deposit

distributeFunds().details: Distributes the funds to the proposals

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

register(uint256).details: locks votingToken from the user and mints votingPowerToken

params._amount: The amount of votingTokens to lock in order to receive votingPowerTokens

releaseVotingTokens().details: Allows users to release their votingToken after the tally date has passed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._maxRequestableAmount: The maximum amount of token that can be requested in proposal

params._minRequestableAmount: The minimum amount of token that can be requested in proposal

submitProposal(string,uint256,uint256,ad.details: Allows users to submit a proposal

params._maximumAmount: The maximum amount of fundingToken requested
params._minimumAmount: The minimum amount of fundingToken requested
params._recipient: The address that will receive the fundingToken if the proposal is accepted

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

voteOnProposal(uint256,uint256).details: Allows users to vote on a proposal

params._amount: The amount of votingToken to vote with
params._proposalId: The id of the proposal to vote on

distributeFunds().notice: Can only be called after the tally date has passed

releaseVotingTokens().notice: Can only be called after the tally date has passed

setMaxRequestableAmount(uint256).notice: Only the owner can call this function

setMinRequestableAmount(uint256).notice: Only the owner can call this function
